game.name: Black Knight
game.description:
Ayleth is a popular medieval knight who has seen daylight for many years. Once, people called him a valiant fighter who was also lashed with a gorgeous shield and a powerful sword. However, the irony is that he has forgotten all his powers and lost them to the dangerous demons which imprisoned him and kept torturing him. Luckily, a hope for positivity has come today. He has got to know about his power, but needs your support to get them back. Join Black Knight game and help this fearless man to fight for the good cause!

Remember it is not going to be easy to earn his spot in this cruel world. Demons are very cruel and will send him to the jail again if he made any mistake. In this one of the best action games for boys, your role is to help black knight to overcome the power of the evil souls. Try to clean the area from all the blood-thirsty monsters and survive as long as possible! Hundreds of enemies will keep coming to you in different waves. Flight like a Spartan and finish all of them with your black knight build!

Saving the life of this brave black knight warrior will be in your hands. He trusts on your skill, so do not anything that let him down in front of his enemies. Do not forget to smash peasants to collect the money and also grab the taxes for the king! You will only progress to the next level if you succeed in collecting the required amount of taxes. Walk through the city and fight hard against anyone you see on your way with your weapons! Good luck to finish all the enemies that can come to you from both the sides!
